contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German district| name=Tirschenreuth| state=Bavaria| capital=[[Tirschenreuth]]| regierungsbezirk=[[Oberpfalz]]| region=Oberpfalz-Nord| area=1,085.08|Kreisschlüssel = 09377 | population=76,308| population_as_of=2008| density=74| carsign=TIR| url=[http://www.landkreis-tirschenreuth.de landkreis-tirschenreuth.de]| map=Bavaria tir.png }} '''Tirschenreuth''' is a ''Kreis'' (district) in the northeastern part of [[Bavaria]], [[Germany]]. Neighboring districts are (from the south, clockwise) [[Neustadt (Waldnaab) (district)|Neustadt (Waldnaab)]], [[Bayreuth (district)|Bayreuth]] and [[Wunsiedel (district)|Wunsiedel]]. To the east are the [[Czech Republic|Czech]] districts of Plzeň and Karlovy Vary. ==Geography== The district is located in the hills of the [[Fichtelgebirge]]. Main rivers in the district are the [[Waldnaab]] and the [[Fichtelnaab]]. ==History== The district was formed in 1972 by merging the previous districts Tirschenreuth and [[Kemnath]]. <!--==Partnerships==--> ==Coat of arms== [[File:Wappen Landkreis Tirschenreuth.png|120px|Coat of arms]] The golden lion in the left of the coat of arms is the symbol if the [[Electorate of the Palatinate]]. The red dragon in the right is the symbol of the [[Waldsassen Abbey]], and symbolizes the margravate of Diepolding. Only the upper part of the dragon is shown (while the monastery had the full dragon as their symbol), to symbolize that the status of the monastery was reduced in 1803 from an imperial monastery to a subordinate of the Palatinate. The blue bar in the bottom right is the symbol of the landgraves of Leuchtenberg, parts of the historically owned by them was included into the district in 1972. ==Towns and municipalities== {| ! width=25% align=left|Towns ! width=25% align=left|Markt ! width=25% align=left|[[Amt (political division)|Verwaltungsgemeinschaften]] ! width=25% align=left|free municipalities |- valign=top || #[[Bärnau]] #[[Erbendorf]] #[[Kemnath]]¹ #[[Mitterteich]]¹ #[[Tirschenreuth]] #[[Waldershof]] #[[Waldsassen]] || #[[Falkenberg, Upper Palatinate|Falkenberg]]¹ #[[Fuchsmühl]] #[[Konnersreuth]] #[[Mähring]] #[[Neualbenreuth]] #[[Plößberg]] #[[Wiesau]]¹ || #Kemnath #Krummennaab #Mitterteich #Neusorg #Wiesau || #[[Brand, Bavaria|Brand]] #[[Ebnath]] #[[Friedenfels]] #[[Immenreuth]] #[[Kastl, Tirschenreuth|Kastl]] #[[Krummennaab]] #[[Kulmain]] #[[Leonberg, Bavaria|Leonberg]] #[[Neusorg]] #[[Pechbrunn]] #[[Pullenreuth]] #[[Reuth bei Erbendorf]] |- |colspan=4| ¹ administrated inside a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{commons category|Landkreis Tirschenreuth}} * [http://www.landkreis-tirschenreuth.de Official website] (German) {{Germany_districts_bavaria}} {{Coord|49.83|12.33|display=title|format=dms}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Tirschenreuth (District)}} [[Category:Districts of Bavaria]] [[Category:Tirschenreuth (district)| ]]
